name: Cut/Sew
description:
Design your own t-shirts in this relaxing puzzlegame!

Features:

  • Puzzles of increasing difficulty including tutorials
  • Creative Mode to design t-shirts freely
  • Many various shapes and patterns to use for designs
  • Wide variety of tools to edit your t-shirt

Game Design, Programming: Jonas Mumm

Sound Design/Music: Junhee ‘Kimposer’ Kim

Made for A GAME BY IT'S COVER 2018. Based on Famicase Art by Rannah Derrick.
